shypht wrote:

The wonderfull world of twinking. In a way I dont care if people do this, I have seen lvl 15 in oracle robes which are found of of lvl 40ish mobs I think. But, what I dont like is how guilds "take over" an item spawn site to supply all of their lower lvls with items takeing away the chacne that others have to get the items.
